a.title:
The Troy Area School District Board of Education will hold a budget, finance & transportation committee meeting at 6:00 P.M. on Wednesday, April 29, 2020. 

 

The meeting will be held in the Troy Area School District Administration Building, 68 Fenner Avenue, Troy, PA 16947

 

Please click the link below to join the webinar:

 

https://zoom.us/j/93648485886?pwd=c3N1cHFFekNTV0pNeE9YbG16RWQwdz09

Password: 119339

 

 

Or iPhone one-tap :
